on_dead_effect.description: Particle effect to play when this damage zone dies

on_downed_effect.description: Particle effect to play when this damage zone gets downed.

on_dead_script_event.description: [string]The script event to trigger when this damage zone dies.

on_dead_animation_event.description: [string]The animation event to trigger when this damage zone dies.

on_dead_audio_event.description: [wwise]The audio event to trigger when this damage zone dies.

on_dead_audio_event_node.description: [string]The audio node to use when this damage zone dies.

on_dead_hide_visibility_group.description: [string]Visibility group to hide when this damage zone dies.

on_dead_show_visibility_group.description: [string]Visibility group to show when this damage zone dies.

on_dead_hide_visibility_mask.description: [string]Visibility mask to hide when this damage zone dies.

on_dead_show_visibility_mask.description: [string]Visibility mask to show when this damage zone dies.

on_downed_hide_visibility_mask.description: [string]Visibility mask to hide when this damage zone gets downed.

on_downed_show_visibility_mask.description: [string]Visibility mask to show when this damage zone gets downed.

destroyed_assignment_event.description: [string]Assignment event tag to send when destroyed, either once when killed or once when entering downed state

on_dead_locomotion_set.description: [string]The name of the locomotion set to activate when it dies. It will not trigger if another zone that affects locomotion is dead. In this case the locomotion set 'crawling' will be triggered.

on_hit_script_event.description: [string]The script event to trigger when this damage zone gets hit without taking damage.

on_bleedout_script_event.description: [string]The script event to trigger when this damage zone gets bled out.

on_downed_script_event.description: [string]The script event to trigger when this damage zone goes into constitution.

on_heal_script_event.description: [string]The script event to trigger when this damage zone gets healed.

on_downed_audio_event.description: [wwise]The audio event to trigger when this damage zone goes into constitution.

on_downed_audio_event_node.description: [string]The audio node to use when this damage zone goes into constitution.

on_downed_locomotion_set.description: [string]The name of the locomotion set to activate when it goes into constitution. It will not trigger if another zone that affects locomotion is dead. In this case the locomotion set 'crawling' will be triggered.

on_damage_script_event.description: [string]The script event to trigger when this damage zone takes damage.

projectile_durable_resistance.description: Projectiles have 2 damages - Normal and Durable. This indicates how much it should scale the damage between the 2 values [Normal] -> [Durable].

armor_angle_check.description: [bool]Whether or not projectiles should check for armor penetration boost on hit.

max_armor.description: Maximum armor the angle check scales to.

ignore_armor_on_self.description: [bool]If checked, this entity does apply armor reduction on damage to itself, but still applies armor penetration reduction on the thing damaging it. Useful for shields that should take damage but stop projectiles/beams.

health.description: The max health of this zone

constitution.description: The max constitution of the zone

immortal.description: [bool]If this is true, this zone cannot die until the entire entity dies.

causes_downed_on_downed.description: [bool]If this is true, the downing of this zone puts the entity in constitution.

causes_death_on_downed.description: [bool]If this is true, the downing of this zone triggers the immediate death of the entity.

causes_downed_on_death.description: [bool]If this is true, the death of this zone puts the entity in constitution.

causes_death_on_death.description: [bool]If this is true, the death of this zone triggers the immediate death of the entity.

affects_main_health.description: As a multiplier between 0-1, this damage only affects the health pool of the damageable zone itself, not the entity's main health.

child_zones.description: [string]The name of the zones that are children to this zone.

kill_children_on_death.description: [bool]If true, when this damageable zone dies we will kill all of it's child damageable zones as well.

regeneration_enabled.description: [bool]If true, this damage zone will regenerate when the health components regeneration cooldown isn't active.

bleedout_enabled.description: [bool]If true, this damage zone will start to bleedout when it's entered constitution.

affected_by_explosions.description: [bool]If true, explosions are applied to this damage zone. If not, the default zone is affected.

affected_by_collision_impact.description: [bool]If true, collision damage will hurt this zone, currently only for vehicles.

on_dead_disable_all_actors.description: [bool]If true, we disable all actors in this damage zone as it dies.

explosion_verification_mode.description: Defines when explosions are verified by raycast.

main_health_affect_capped_by_zone_health.description: [bool]If true, the main health contribution is capped by the health + constitutiuon of the damage zone. Should be true for zones that can be gibbed/dismembered.

hit_effect_receiver_type.description: The type of hit effect to play when the zone gets hit. If this is set to HitEffectReceiverType_Count, it will assume the hit effect of the HitEffectComponent.

use_surface_effect.description: [bool]If enabled, will use the surface effect rather than the hit effect.

health_event_triggers.description: Events that get played at certain health percentages.

health_event_trigger_audio_node.description: [string]The audio node to use to play the health event trigger sounds.
